Reviews.Title: oh please
Reviews.Author: oldgeek
Reviews.Content: Filmguy's review caused quite a laugh for me.  This Vivitar is a FILM camera!!!  No, there is not a lcd screen to review or preview your shots.  You will not find one on ANY film camera from any maker.  I have an older model of this camera and it works great.  It is very basic (no autofocus, shutter priority or aperture priority).  But the glass is good and will take good pics.No lcd!! lol :D

Reviews.Title: vivatar's new manual 35mm camera
Reviews.Author: JB4
Reviews.Content: This camera was pretty good once I learned how to use it. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Hibbard
Reviews.Content: Great camera for a student taking photo class. Easy to understand instructions made it easy to use for great pictures.

Reviews.Title: simply perfection!
Reviews.Author: Antoinette Lee
Reviews.Content: I only had this camera for a day && I already LOVEEE it. It's the perfect thing for beginners and photography class 101. I'm having a lot of fun and getting used to setting the aperture and really taking nice photos. This is a SLR camera so if you want a digital camera that has photo previews,  this isn't the one for you. Tgw only thing I'm having trouble with is the battery tgat came with it. Supposedly if I put it in, I'm supposed to see a red/green light to know that it works, but eithe way that I turn the batteries,  I don't see any light....maybe idk where to look or just gotta get used to the camera first.But nothing was broken on the camera during shipping which is greattt. It comes with the strap, the 28-70mm lens, batteries,tne protection case and a split screen lens. Honesty for under $200 I'm VERY pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: quacka
Reviews.Content: Great camera, easy to use, but the included strap broke and the camera almost fell off. the eye piece would pop off multiple times. other than those, it is an amazing camera. I can't wait to see the final prints it taken

Reviews.Title: Who makes a camera without  an lcd sreen???
Reviews.Author: film guy "filmguy"
Reviews.Content: When I first made the purchase I was very excited. I thought it was a great deal and I couldn't wait to get it. Well, when the camera arrived I was terribly disapointed. Not only was it very cheap in construction, it didn't have a LCD picture view screen. I was shocked that cameras were still being made without the LCD screen. I couldn't use the camera because I would have wasted a lot of time and money going back and fourth to the pharmacy just to view the pictures. I thought this was a waste of money, I wouldn't pay 20 dollars for a camera like that. I sent it back and got a full refund from amazon.

ProductInfo.Features:
Ideal 35mm SLR for Students
Manual Focus & Exposure
Manual Loading, Advance, Rewind
Accepts Pentax K Lenses
Includes Fitted Case
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar SLR Camera with 28-70 Zoom Lens (VIV-V3800-2870)
